Communication

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • Communication.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Message class to create message format for the communication between entities and servers (machines). Class is serializable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        private int numRestocked
        Number of parts that were restocked

      • state

        private int state
        Current state

      • vehicle

        private java.lang.String vehicle
        Type of vehicle. Values can be: own car - customer ID. replacement car - R# (where # is the number of the replacement car). none - '-'.

      • number

        private int number
        Number to increment/decrement. Values can be: 1 - increment. -1 - decrement.

      • flagMissingPart

        private java.lang.String flagMissingPart
        Flag signaling if Manager has been adviced for missing part. Values can be: T - true. F - false.

      • id

        private int id
        Auxiliary integer for id of either Customer or Mechanic, used in Park

      • flagCustomer

        private boolean flagCustomer
        Flag checking if it was the Customer using the park. Values can be: true - it was the Customer who used the Park. false - it was the Mechanic who used the Park.
